title: Mehmet Yilmaz - Resume
aboutText: I'm a Software Test Engineer with 4+ years of experience building and maintaining test automation frameworks. My focus is on ensuring software quality through comprehensive testing strategies and continuous improvement.
ind1: Developed test scenarios using Cucumber with Gherkin syntax in Jira and IntelliJ.
ind2: Performed database validation using JDBC for backend testing.
ind3: Used Git for version control in collaborative automation projects.
galileo1: Used Visual Studio Code as the primary IDE to develop end-to-end UI test scenarios with JavaScript and Playwright for web applications.
galileo2: Integrated automation scripts into CI/CD pipelines to support continuous testing.
galileo3: Performed backend validation by writing SQL queries to ensure consistency between the UI and database.
galileo4: mplemented API tests (REST) including authentication, status code checks, and response data validation.
galileo5: Followed Page Object Model (POM) for scalable and maintainable test architecture.
galileo6: Implemented test setup and teardown scripts for database state management before and after test execution.
galileo7: Worked in an Agile/Scrum environment, actively participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
